title: Firewall error party
body: Updated this morning (5.1) and this friendly guy came to say hello. I know everyone's had a problem with this bug at some time or another, I had it once a year back for a few days. I've tried all the fixes etc. I've tried both my accounts, my friend on the same connection is having the same issue. Trying on other region accounts results the same. Is anyone els having this problem? Such a pain because from my experiences you just have to kind of wait for it to leave. Seems to be something to do with the patch though, I was playing fine yesterday.

replies.body: Same problem. Didn't have it before and still persisted after I re-added league to the firewall exceptions. {{item:3070}}

firewall op

Have you tried re-establishing League as a program you're letting through the firewall? Sometimes a big patch will change League's internal name, and it's simply that your firewall didn't update with it as well, hence it's not allowing the new League to communicate.

Best of luck.
Same thing here. No fix found unfortunately.
